/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `Â«expr â‹™ Â» -/
-- Here we need to see that the stalk maps are really local ring homomorphisms.
-- This can be solved by type class inference, because stalk maps of isomorphisms are isomorphisms
-- and isomorphisms are local ring homomorphisms.
-- We show that the stalk of the restriction is isomorphic to the original stalk,
theorem Î“_def : Î“ = Â«expr â‹™ Â» forget_to_SheafedSpace.op SheafedSpace.Î“ :=
  rfl
#align Î“_def Î“_def
preimage_basic_open:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `Â«expr âŸ¶ Â» -/
theorem preimage_basic_open {X Y : LocallyRingedSpace} (f : Â«expr âŸ¶ Â» X Y) {U : Opens Y} (s : Y.presheaf.obj (op U)) :
    (Opens.map f.1.base).obj (Y.to_RingedSpace.basic_open s) =
      @RingedSpace.basic_open X.to_RingedSpace ((Opens.map f.1.base).obj U) (f.1.c.app _ s) :=
  by
  ext
  constructor
  Â· rintro âŸ¨âŸ¨y, hyUâŸ©, hy : IsUnit _, rfl : y = _âŸ©
    erw [RingedSpace.mem_basic_open _ _ âŸ¨x, show x âˆˆ (opens.map f.1.base).obj U from hyUâŸ©]
    rw [â† PresheafedSpace.stalk_map_germ_apply]
    exact (PresheafedSpace.stalk_map f.1 _).is_unit_map hy
  Â· rintro âŸ¨y, hy : IsUnit _, rflâŸ©
    erw [RingedSpace.mem_basic_open _ _ âŸ¨f.1.base y.1, y.2âŸ©]
    rw [â† PresheafedSpace.stalk_map_germ_apply] at hy
    exact (is_unit_map_iff (PresheafedSpace.stalk_map f.1 _) _).mp hy
#align preimage_basic_open preimage_basic_open

basic_open_zero:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `Â«exprâŠ¥Â» -/
-- This actually holds for all ringed spaces with nontrivial stalks.
@[simp]
theorem basic_open_zero (X : LocallyRingedSpace) (U : Opens X.carrier) :
    X.to_RingedSpace.basic_open (0 : X.presheaf.obj <| op U) = Â«exprâŠ¥Â» :=
  by
  simp only [RingedSpace.basic_open, isUnit_zero_iff, map_zero, zero_ne_one' (X.presheaf.stalk _), Set.setOf_false,
    Set.image_empty]
  rfl
#align basic_open_zero basic_open_zero
